name: Spice Villa
history: Spice Villa was founded in 2005 to bring traditional Indian flavors to a modern audience.
offers: Free dessert with every main course on weekends

menu.name: Paneer Butter Masala
menu.description: Cottage cheese cubes simmered in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy.

menu.name: Butter Chicken
menu.description: Tender chicken chunks cooked in a buttery tomato cream sauce.

menu.name: Veg Biryani
menu.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with fresh vegetables and aromatic spices.

menu.name: Chicken Biryani
menu.description: Spicy chicken layered with saffron-infused basmati rice.

menu.name: Garlic Naan
menu.description: Soft leavened Indian bread topped with garlic and butter.

menu.name: Tandoori Roti
menu.description: Whole wheat flatbread baked in a tandoor oven.

menu.name: Gulab Jamun
menu.description: Milk-solid dumplings soaked in warm rose-flavored syrup.

menu.name: Rasgulla
menu.description: Spongy cheese balls in light sugar syrup.

menu.name: Masala Dosa
menu.description: Crispy South Indian crepe stuffed with spiced potato filling.

menu.name: Lassi
menu.description: Traditional Punjabi sweet yogurt drink served chilled.
